newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Phillips in talks over Venezuela petchem project.
newsitem.headline: Phillips in talks over Venezuela petchem project.

text.p: Phillips Petroleum is in preliminary talks with Venezuela over a possible petrochemical or plastics venture in the country, a company official said on Wednesday.

"Phillips is very strong in petrochemicals, plastics and chemicals and those would be areas we would have great interest in looking for opportunities to participate in," said Paul Appel, global ventures manager for Phillips.
He added that preliminary talks had taken place but declined to specify which project he was looking at. "There is nothing concrete on the drawing board right now," he added.
